ModMetaData.name: No Breacher/Sapper Raids
ModMetaData.author: Laureeeeeeeeeeeeeeen
ModMetaData.description:
Disables breacher and sapper raids both. The raids still happen but a different strategy is chosen.
Load after any mod which adds new incidents/raids. Note: While this should work fine on 1.4 I have only tested it on 1.5 with all DLCs, good luck!
